description: Conversion of garage to habitable room, Replacement of garage door with window in front elevation, Replacement windows and door in front elevation, Alterations to porch roof, First floor side extension, Window in end gable, Single storey side to rear extension with Oriel window at rear; Replacement windows in first floor rear elevation, External alterations
decision_conditions: The roof area of the extension hereby permitted shall not be used as a balcony, roof garden or similar amenity area without the grant of further specific permission from the local planning authority.

<p>Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (or any order revoking and re-enacting that order with or without modification), no window(s)/door(s), other than those shown on the approved plans shall be installed in the flank elevation(s) of the development hereby permitted without the prior permission in writing of the local planning authority.</p>
The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents:&nbsp;<span style="line-height: 115%;">Design
and access statement, reasonable exception statement, 198- 001 P05, &nbsp;198-
002 P05, 198- 003 P05, &nbsp;198- 005 P05, &nbsp;198- 006 P05, &nbsp;198- 007
P05, 198- 101 P05, 198- 100 P05, 198- 105 P05, 198-106 P05</span>
The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
